DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess ex vivo wettability commonly prescribe silicone hydrogel ( SiH ) contact lens three market contact lens care solution .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Silicone Hydrogel Lens Wettability With Marketed Lens Care Solutions
DOC.criteria: 18 year age Soft contact lens wear daily wear basis Able wear lens least 8 hour Generally healthy normal ocular health Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply Use additional lens cleaner Known sensitivity ingredient study product History ocular surgery/trauma within last 6 month Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply
